name: Breakout - Demo
description:
Breakout is the low poly, First-Person "the floor is lava" platformer that will prove how good your reflexes really are.

Accept the challenge: run, jump, crouch and use special abilities to dodge the obstacles in order to complete each level, put your name on the top of the leader boards and, the most important part, have fun.

This is a demo and it only has 22 levels! The full version of the game has 120 levels.

Key features (Full Version):

  • A Campaign mode with 70 levels
  • Special abilities like: Slow Motion, Grappling Hook, Jetpack and many more
  • Online leader boards for all levels so everyone can see how skilled you are
  • Minimalist visuals that help you focus on what's important
  • No paid DLCs, only free updates
  • Enjoyable by a wide variety of player skill since most players, casuals or not, should be able to complete the levels
  • A fresh Holidays update that adds 50 new levels, 2 new special abilities, new obstacles and mechanics
